lyrics.text:
Kuo toe nofo hifo
‘A hotau ‘Eiki ko Sīsū
Ki he nima to’omata’u,
‘O e ‘Otua totonu.

Ke mou holi fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki he ‘Eiki anga’ofa,
‘O fetuiaki ma’u pē,
Ke ma’u homou ‘api tō.

Ke mou fa’ifa’itaki
Ki he kakai ‘o e langi,
Ke mou mo’ui, ke ‘ofa,
Pea fa’a fakafeta’i.

’Oku mou mo’ui mate,
Ki māmani mo e hia,
Mate mo ho’omou ‘ofa,
Ki he me’a ‘a māmani.

Pea ko homou mo’ui,
Ko e mo’ui mo’oni,
Kuo fufū mo Kalaisi,
‘I he funga ‘o e Tamai.

Pea te mou teunga’ia,
‘O hangē ko homou ‘Eiki,
Pea te mou hoko atu
Ki he ‘Eiki ‘i he langi.
